result.eng: Some airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ga: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.orig: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.html: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ponchtml: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-EabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i Nua-EaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: One [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ga: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.orig: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.html: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíl láiṫreoir aṁáin naċ raiḃ eitleán ar biṫ i gceist agus go mba ḃuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
